alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 6:48PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana and central El Paso Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 648 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Sunland Park to near Clint. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Central El Paso, East El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Clint, Horizon City, Fabens, Sunland Park, San Elizario, Fort Bliss, Socorro, Sparks, Agua Dulce, Biggs Field, Fort Bliss Northeast, Dairyland, Lake Way Estates, and Montana Vista. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 15 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
